quotes.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.
quotes.author: James Cameron

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.text: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.text: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth
